page.title: 12Dores/Abriachan_Dores Gala
page.content: The {Gala}is held every June in Dores.It's a day out for all the family.There are stalls for all the family like {Bric a Brac}and {Tombola} .There is also a beer tent if you fancy a pint.You could try your hand at {Tug of War}or{Clay Pigeon {Shooting.}You could try to climb the {Greasy Pole,}ride the {Crazy Horse}or{ {Crazy Bike}or just have a badge printed.This year there was a {Beat {the Goalie }competition and a {Fancy {Dress }competition.In one game you had to get 3 balls in a boot to win 20p.We collected Â£81 for the {School Raffle.} After the {Gala}in the evening is the{ {Gala Dance. { }
